definition: The term "ehrenamtlich" refers to engaging in activities or work on a voluntary basis, without expecting any financial compensation in return. It is commonly used to describe individuals who dedicate their time and skills to contribute to a cause, organization, or community without seeking personal gain.

examples.german: Ich arbeite ehrenamtlich in einem Tierheim.
examples.english: I work as a volunteer in an animal shelter.

examples.german: Sie engagiert sich ehrenamtlich für die Umwelt.

examples.english: We support needy people as volunteers.
He voluntarily leads a youth group.
The organization is looking for volunteer helpers.
